title: Outbound Caller / Customer Service Representative
job_overview:
Kindly note: Only applications submitted through the link below will be considered. Messages sent here will not be entertained. Thank you!

Wentwood Capital is a real estate lending firm based in Miami.

We are a team of rockstar A+ performers from top companies, driven by a culture of hard work and teamwork!

Here’s a glimpse of our last company meetup in Bohol:
www.>facebook.com/share/v/16LqBr7JEm/

How You Will Contribute:

1. Make Outbound Calls (90%)
• Contact potential real estate clients, introduce our services, and understand their needs.
• Answer inquiries, provide information, and nurture strong client relationships.

2. Administrative Tasks (10%)
• Maintain and update a detailed database of leads, logging all interactions.
• Stay informed on real estate trends to communicate effectively with clients.

What We’re Looking For:

• Experience in cold calling or telemarketing, ideally in the real estate industry, with strong communication skills to engage and persuade clients effectively.
• Self-motivated, organized, and detail-oriented, capable of working independently, meeting goals, and keeping accurate records.
• Familiarity with real estate terminology, market trends, and property types, along with the ability to handle multiple tasks and adapt to changing priorities.
• Positive attitude, resilience, and a strong drive to succeed in a fast-paced environment.
• Fluency in Spanish is a plus, offering additional opportunities for bilingual candidates.

Wentwood Capital Perks:

• Competitive Salary
• Annual Performance-Based Bonus
• Paid Time Off
• Supportive and Positive Work Environment
• All-Expense Paid Annual Company Trips and Meet-Up

How to Apply:
If you believe you're a good fit for this role, we'd love to hear from you. Apply now through this link:
